data.name: about-us-text
data.value: The company has been operating since December 5, 2011. Karim Temir Tikinti Gurashdirma LLC has been involved in many construction and reconstruction works. It is a legal company that has worked with many large companies and state enterprises. Caspian Pipe Coatings, ADO-G We have cooperation with companies such as the Aliyev Oil Refinery. Our company is expanding its cooperation not only with local companies but also with many foreign companies. MHWirth has also worked with foreign companies such as North West Construction in many areas. Currently, we have relations and cooperation with many companies engaged in construction, repair, installation and reconstruction in our country.

data.name: company-text
environmental-text
general-text
data.value: KARIM REPAIR CONSTRUCTION INSTALLATION LLC understands its responsibility to the society for its small impact on the environment through its numerous activities. As a result of this responsibility, the company develops a specific environmental protection plan for each project it implements. In this regard, it develops a plan of preventive measures for the most efficient use of material resources, maximum savings on energy carriers, prevention of environmental waste. There are also areas where the company takes a more responsible approach to its activities. These are issues of protection of water basins from pollution and land reclamation. The company considers compliance with all environmental acts, directives and norms adopted in the Republic of Azerbaijan as the basis for its activities.

data.name: karim-text
data.value: The group of companies sees the basis of its activities in the dynamic and all-round development of the enterprise, the effective use of material resources and the maximum possible protection of the environment for future generations. To this end, the company has made the following commitments: Ensuring compliance with all international and domestic environmental standards; Reducing environmental pollution by saving material resources; Improving at all stages of production processes and reducing energy consumption; Continuous improvement of the enterprise's environmental protection activities; Preparation of a plan of preventive measures to prevent littering of the environment; Constant monitoring of the situation on labor protection and industrial safety, continuous improvement of the situation in this area; To create safe working conditions in its production areas, to observe the norms of labor safety and hygiene in this field; Involve all employees in "occupational safety" and "environmental protection" and achieve continuous improvement in this area; The main mechanisms envisaged by the enterprise in the implementation of environmental policy. Communicate the essence of environmental policy to all employees; Evaluate all initiatives to protect the environment and the environment; Achieve continuous increase of environmental awareness of staff; Rewarding creative initiatives on material saving, energy saving, application of new technologies; Ecological certification of manufactured products; The implementation of environmental policy will always be in the center of attention, as reflected in all the contracts signed by the company. Environmental policy will be constantly improved, corrected and updated during the operation of the enterprise. "Karim repair, construction and installation" understands its responsibility to society for its small impact on the environment through its numerous activities. As a result of this responsibility, the company develops a specific environmental protection plan for each project it implements. In this regard, it develops a plan of preventive measures for the most efficient use of material resources, maximum savings on energy carriers, prevention of environmental waste. There are also areas where the company takes a more responsible approach to its activities. These are issues of protection of water basins from pollution and land reclamation. The company considers compliance with all environmental acts, directives and norms adopted in the Republic of Azerbaijan as the basis for its activities.

data.name: methods-text
data.value: KARIM REPAIR CONSTRUCTION INSTALLATION LLC undertakes to take urgent measures to prevent industrial injuries and eliminate the causes of accidents and risks. It aims to create a working environment in accordance with the requirements of international standards and state standards in this area

data.name: policy-text
data.value: The company always prefers to improve its internal environmental policy, as it has certain effects on the environment during its production activities. In order to ensure a comprehensive approach to environmental protection, there is a constant activity within the enterprise.

data.name: question
data.value: DO YOU HAVE A QUESTION FOR US?

data.name: safety-text
data.value: "KARIM REPAIR CONSTRUCTION INSTALLATION" Company highly appreciates its labor resources. Constantly develops healthy and safe working conditions for its employees. The company is based on the following principles: The positive impact of the results of production activities on the health of employees; The right of each member of the staff to work in safe working conditions; Close liaison with public and government agencies in addressing security issues.
